    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rime Foil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1876)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The steely blue blade of this _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)_ emerges from a hilt wrapped in thick leather and trimmed in fur to protect the wielder's hand.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** You hit a creature using the _rime foil_ as your last action; **Effect** You cast 5th-level [_phantom prison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=969) on the target (DC 22 Will to disbelieve). If the target has been damaged by a _[shattered plan](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1877)_ in the last round, the DC is instead 24. 

**Special** The _rime foil_ pairs with the _shattered plan_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rime Foil
